title: Diwali Festival Celebration
description: Join us for the grand Diwali celebration in the heart of the city, featuring fireworks, cultural performances, and delicious food.

title: International Film Festival
description: Showcasing the best of international cinema, this festival will feature screenings, discussions, and workshops.

title: Surajkund Mela
description: A vibrant fair celebrating Indian handicrafts, handlooms, and cuisines, featuring stalls from various states.

title: Mumbai Marathon
description: Join thousands of runners in the annual Mumbai Marathon, with multiple categories for all age groups.

title: Rath Yatra Festival
description: Experience the colorful Rath Yatra, where massive chariots of Lord Jagannath are pulled through the streets.

title: Bangalore Tech Summit
description: A premier tech conference showcasing innovations in technology and startup culture in India.
